title: More ways to search:
cleaned_text: News [News](#) [DailyMed Announcements](/dailymed/dailymed-announcements.cfm) Posted: September 15, 2021The RxImage API will cease operation on December 31, 2021. All RxImage data are available for download from [here](https://www.nlm.nih.gov/databases/download/pill_image.html). DailyMed will be removing pill images provided by the RxImage API on October 31, 2021. Pill images submitted by labelers with their structured product labeling will remain on DailyMed. [Get RSS News & Updates](/dailymed/rss-updates.cfm) The DailyMed RSS feed provides updates and information about new drug labels approved by the FDA and published on NLM's DailyMed Web site.
